name: Island of 16 sisters Part 2
description:
Robert has already met some of the girls and now he even has his own room in a tower on the island. The girls love him, so he might like living here and enjoy his life for a while. But what if the Father does something really mad?

The second part of the adventure game Island of 16 sisters takes you to new and unexpected parts of the island. Meet more beautiful girls and solve more interesting puzzles. Will you help Robert escape the island this time?

Properties:
* Double the length of the first part
* In English and other languages (German, Spanish, Czech / Cesky, Polish / Polski etc.)
* Classic point and click adventure game optimized for tablets and smartphones
* Pre-rendered graphics
* SuperHelp for quick help in the game
* Many puzzles
* Low price which will help us develop more adventure games

Help: In the menu you can find help for any location in the game, your collected items and you can also turn the music and sounds on or off, or restart the game there.
